TopicTitle: I have some trouble downloading crafts.

Articles.Content:
Hey guys, i am new here, and i basically use the forum to get some cool mods and crafts.

But i started having a pain while downloading crafts in the past days, when the download link is clicked it leads to no site at all.

It shows: 

Quote

www./download/randomnumbersandletters/nameofthecraft.craft

I never saw an archive host site with no domain.

I saw some really awesome vessels, like this MK3 Cargo VTOL by Redshift OTF and the Quinjet by Rune they are quite old, but still usable.

 

You guys know a way of bypassing that? Any tip will help a LOT.

Hi Uppergot, welcome to the forums.

Craft aren't hosted here, just links to craft elsewhere, so if the links are not maintained by their poster all you can do is hope they fix it, check KerbalX.com or se if anyone has a copy.

Just now, sal_vager said:

Hi Uppergot, welcome to the forums.

Craft aren't hosted here, just links to craft elsewhere, so if the links are not maintained by their poster all you can do is hope they fix it, check KerbalX.com or se if anyone has a copy.

I checked Kerbal X, but there is no copy there at all, but after some research i saw that the mediafire links were removed, i filled the URL with the mediafire domain and it is fixed. thanks by the way.
See if @Redshift OTF or @Rune still have the craft files.

Never mind, I see you solved the problem yourself. Enjoy the crafts!

Edited January 18, 2016 by Rune
